issue.title: Add complexity metrics differences before/after

labels.name: duplicate
labels.description: This issue or pull request already exists

repository.name: bugbug
repository.description: Platform for Machine Learning projects on Software Engineering

issue.body:
So we can see if a patch is *increasing* or *reducing* complexity metrics.

See also #1159 and #1314.

body: rust-code-analysis is already giving us this information, we just need to make use of it.

issue.title: Add diff in complexity metrics to the features

repository.name: bugbug
repository.description: Platform for Machine Learning projects on Software Engineering

issue.body:
We have added complexity metrics *after* the patch. It might be useful to also have the diff of complexity metrics, to check e.g. if the cognitive complexity increased with the patch, or if we have more function parameters than before, etc., etc..

See also #1159 and #1314.
